scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/ && cp index.js dist/ && yarn install --production --modules-folder dist/node_modules && (cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip .)
scripts.s3.cp: aws --profile restyled s3 cp --acl public-read dist/lambda.zip s3://infra.restyled.io/logdna-cloudwatch.zip
scripts.release.prod: aws --profile restyled lambda update-function-code --function-name restyled-prod-logdna-cloudwatch --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda.zip
